note: collider problems mentioned in this post may be the problems of wheel colliders and\or at the same time problems of objects' coliders around KSC

1. those are supposed to climb over obstacles on distant planets but they cannot overjump a tiny rail?

(the response force of hitting a rail even slowly is very high - are you using Motor.SetTorque on collision??!)

 

2. for Kerbals wheel colliders do not exist 

you can run, jump and do hoops through this wheel and also you fall through it
